word: The crucifixion of Christ was the last action that caused the nation's downfall. "Last of all He sent unto them His Son, saying, They will reverence My Son. But when the husbandmen saw the Son, they said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill Him, and let us seize on His inheritance. And they caught Him, and cast Him out of the vineyard, and slew Him" [Matthew 21:37-39].
